p: To assess if these measles infections were caused by MeV strains with mutations in amino acid residues targeted by neutralizing antibodies, we sequenced the MeV H gene directly from biological samples. Sequencing of the full MeV B3 H gene was obtained from a patient who was previously vaccinated with two vaccines doses and from four subjects with unknown vaccination status. In all these cases, no amino acid changes were identified in the H protein compared to the H protein of the MeV B3 and D8 strains responsible for primary infections ( Figure 5).
